name: roturl
description: RotURL is a simple substitution cipher for encoding/obscuring URLs embedded in other URLs (e.g. in a querystring). Also, common chars that need to be escaped (:/?=&%#) are mapped to infrequently used capital letters, so this generally yields shorter querystrings, too.
author: Sergey Khalazdinski <gansbrest@gmail.com> (http://distinctplace.com/)
